div.p: This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/healthcareservice-eligibility defines the following codes:

tr.td: Eligibility for this service requires the patient to be of legal age.

description.value: This code system contains codes for documenting the attributes of eligibility for health care services.
